titleStmt.title: A poem on the coronation of James the II, King of Great-Britain, France and Ireland, &c., who was crowned at Westminster-Abey the 23th of April, 1685
titleStmt.author: Ker, Patrick, fl. 1691.

notesStmt.note: Written by Patrick Ker. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
